title: Structural insights into novel therapeutic deep eutectic systems with capric acid using 1D, 2D NMR and DSC techniques with superior gut permeability
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,14793-14806
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01469C, Paper

Bayan Alkhawaja, Faisal Al-Akayleh, Jehad Nasereddin, Muhammad Kamran, Tim Woodman, Zaid Al-Rubaye, Nidal Qinna, Mayyas Al-Remawi, Ali R. Olaimat
Therapeutic deep eutectic solvents (THEDSs) are the best exemplification of green alternative formulations of active pharmaceutical ingredients (APIs) that offer superlative properties of APIs.
